course_title: Environmental Health Seminar: PH Communication Env.Justice
class_notes: Topic: Public Health Communication for Environmental Justice.  Learn how to employ public health communication theories, skills, and strategies to support the efforts of the climate justice movement. Students will have the opportunity to create a climate justice communication campaign plan, use text and images to translate climate science into effective public health communication products, and develop a campaign evaluation plan.
course_description: Various topics by GDEH faculty such as Design, Delivery, and Assessment of WASH in Schools; Politics of Public Health; and Public Health Communication of Environmental Justice. Check OPUS/Atlas for current topics and descriptions.
